54362960-4c3b-49c8-8e19-172f407db045:
A child of the manticore can grow spikes from her body and throw them. At 1st level, a child of the manticore can throw spikes from her body as a natural throwing {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g}, which replaces her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This ability otherwise functions as the shifter claws class feature and benefits from all shifter claws improvements as well as shifter's fury.
At will, a child of the manticore in her natural form can gain two spike attacks as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to use as a weapon. The spikes can be used as a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} (1d3 if she is {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}). As the child of the manticore gains levels, the power of her spikes increases. At 3rd level, her spikes bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver. At 7th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to 1d6 (1d4 if Small). At 11th level, her spike damage increases to 1d8 (1d6 if Small). At 13th level, her spike damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if Small). At 17th level, the damage die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3. Finally, at 19th level, the spikes bypass DR N/adamantine and N/-.
63c929ed-589f-4877-a67d-e9a6197f83e3:
A child of the manticore can grow spikes from her body and throw them. At 1st level, a child of the manticore can throw spikes from her body as a natural throwing {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g}, which replaces her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. Finally, at 19th level, the spikes bypass DR N/adamantine and N/-.
ea816737-619a-446f-82fc-5e4eb962f579:
A child of the manticore can take on the aspect of the manticore as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. While in this form, she gains a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} scores. She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
At 5th level, when making her first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} in each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the child of the manticore throws two spikes instead of one ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} the weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dice for the spike attack twice and add the results together before adding bonuses from Strength, weapon abilities (such as flaming), precision-based damage, and other damage bonuses).
At 10th level, the inherent bonus to Strength and Dexterity increases to +4.
At 15th level, the inherent bonus to Strength and Dexterity increases to +6.
At 20th level, when making her first attack in each round, the child of the manticore throws four spikes instead of one (roll the weapon damage dice for the spike attack four times and add the results together before adding bonuses from Strength, weapon abilities (such as flaming), precision-based damage, and other damage bonuses). Her inherent bonus to Strength and Dexterity also increases to +8. Additionally, she now can use her manticore aspect and manticore shape at will.
This alters and replaces all improvements to shifter aspect.
a58e3c92-114a-4615-b0ab-9d822ed9230a: A creature with this ability gains two additional claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, which it can only use against an enemy it grapples. A creature must start its turn with a grappled enemy in order to use {g|Encyclopedia:Rake}rake{/g}.
8e002bda-34a5-411d-a784-7e68533f622f: A dragonblood shifter can temporarily imbue her body with draconic majesty as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. When activating this ability, the dragonblood shifter must select one of the chromatic or metallic dragon types. Her draconic aspect abilities grant resistances and deal a type of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} based on the chosen dragon type. While shifted into this form, she gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} 5 against the energy type that corresponds to her selected dragon type; also, whenever she prevents damage with either the resistance or the immunity provided by her draconic aspect ability, she {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to the amount of damage prevented. She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. The dragonblood shifter can select a different dragon type every time she uses this ability, but she must end her current draconic aspect and activate this ability again in order to change her chosen dragon type. Evil dragonblood shifters can only choose from chromatic dragons, good dragonblood shifters can only choose from metallic dragons, and neutral dragonblood shifters can choose any dragon type.
6ad9ea12-fe15-4beb-a4ce-5a3f8940ea82:
A dragonblood shifter can temporarily imbue her body with draconic majesty as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. When activating this ability, the dragonblood shifter must select one of the chromatic or metallic dragon types. Her draconic aspect abilities grant resistances and deal a type of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} based on the chosen dragon type. While shifted into this form, she gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} 5 against the energy type that corresponds to her selected dragon type; also, whenever she prevents damage with either the resistance or the immunity provided by her draconic aspect ability, she {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to the amount of damage prevented. She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. The dragonblood shifter can select a different dragon type every time she uses this ability, but she must end her current draconic aspect and activate this ability again in order to change her chosen dragon type. Evil dragonblood shifters can only choose from chromatic dragons, good dragonblood shifters can only choose from metallic dragons, and neutral dragonblood shifters can choose any dragon type.
At 5th level, the energy resistance granted by the dragonblood shifter's draconic aspect increases to 10. At 10th level, the energy resistance granted by the dragonblood shifter's draconic aspect increases to 15, and she gains a breath weapon of her energy type that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of damage per shifter level within a 30-foot cone. A target can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the dragonblood shifter's shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) to reduce the damage by half. The dragonblood shifter can use her breath weapon a number of times per day equal to half her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
At 15th level, the energy resistance granted by the dragonblood shifter's draconic aspect increases to 20.
At 20th level, the dragonblood shifter becomes immune to the energy type that corresponds to her selected dragon type while in her draconic aspect and gains {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 10 + her shifter level.
c5a4bede-e965-45fc-8f9d-b17e062cb636:
A feyform shifter can take on a First World aspect and assume fey traits as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. While in this form, she gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/cold iron. Her body outline becomes indistinct; she is treated as though she has {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20% miss chance). She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
At 5th level, the feyform shifter's DR increases to 2/cold iron, and she grows a pair of butterfly-like wings that grant her immunity to ground-based effects.
At 10th level, the feyform shifter's DR increases to 5/cold iron, and she gains a +4 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
At 15th level, the feyform shifter's DR increases to 7/cold iron, and her bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects increases to +6.
At 20th level, the feyform shifter's DR increases to 10/cold iron. She becomes resistant to movement-impairing effects (as per the freedom of movement {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}) and gains {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 10 + her {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g}.
This alters and replaces all improvements to shifter aspect.
c4eac042-aafb-4bad-a684-103e39cbc23d:
A fiendflesh shifter's claws are infused with rage at her creators from the evil Outer Planes. At 1st level, a fiendflesh shifter's claws overcome the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of any evil outsiders. This ability otherwise functions as the shifter claws class feature.
This alters shifter claws.
0f545b4a-6f21-43dd-a8b7-146911a7fdcb:
A rageshaper can deliver blows that demolish his foes. This functions as the shifter claws class ability, except his {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} are treated as slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. Additionally, the rageshaper's terrible slam deals increased {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to constructs. At 1st level, terrible slam deals 5 additional points damage to constructs. This increases to 10 points at 5th level, 15 points at 10th level, and 20 points at 15th level.
At will, a rageshaper in his natural form can gain two slam attacks as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to use as a weapon. The slam can be used as a primary natural attack, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} (1d3 if he is {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}). As the rageshaper gains levels, the power of his slams increases. At 3rd level, his slams bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver. At 7th level, his slam damage increases to 1d6 (1d4 if Small). At 11th level, his slam damage increases to 1d8 (1d6 if Small). At 13th level, his slam damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if Small). At 17th level, the damage die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3. Finally, at 19th level, the slams bypass DR N/adamantine and N/-.

d516ea34-0002-475c-8868-e930f63cb9bd:
A rageshaper can enter a state of intense fury, transforming into a living engine of destruction. This ability functions as the barbarian's rage class feature, except entering this state of fury requires a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. The rageshaper can maintain this form for 1 minute.
The rageshaper gains all benefits of a barbarian's rage and grows one {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category larger.
The rageshaper can use devastating form a number of times per day equal to his shifter level (the Limitless Rage mythic ability removes this restriction).
Once per use of devastating form, a rageshaper can use the ground slam ability.
Ground Slam: Once per use of devastating form, a rageshaper can slam the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per shifter level + an additional 1d6 bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every enemy hit by this ability to all enemies within 20 feet of him and knocking them prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the rageshaper's shifter level + the rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.
When the rageshaper ends his devastating form ability, he is fatigued for 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. The rageshaper cannot enter devastating form again while fatigued or exhausted. If the rageshaper falls {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}, his devastating form ends immediately.
At 10th level, the rageshaper can grow up to a maximum of two size categories larger with devastating form; his rage is now treated as greater rage, as the barbarian ability of the same name; and the damage die of his ground slam ability increases to d8.
At 20th level, the rageshaper gains a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} in devastating form; his rage is now treated as mighty rage, as the barbarian ability of the same name; and the damage die of his ground slam ability increases to d10.
This replaces wild shape, shifter aspect, and all improvements to shifter aspect.
8c3d3565-77b7-4af5-aa32-ad89889d2761: A wild effigy still takes on the shapes of natural animals, but rather than transforming her body into flesh and muscle, she transforms into constructed effigies of her chosen aspects.
e4efdd48-40c2-41a5-95f8-8b3f7336c1a4:
A wild effigy's animal aspects are made out of carved, living rock. When a wild effigy is shifted into one of her minor or major aspects, she gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/- where N is equal to her shifter level.
This replaces track.
791acba5-95ad-42b6-8b60-7853c7330b31:
All shifter aspects have a minor form and a major form. The minor form grants the shifter some of the animal's physical traits, while the major aspect is the form she takes on when she uses wild shape to transform into an animal completely. The list of abilities gained with the major aspect include those gained from the wild shape class feature, but the benefits gained from any resulting changes to {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} are not listed here.
This ability lasts for 1 hour (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using major form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The shifter can use major form a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
b73a246b-0ce5-4979-85a4-587f727b588f: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}, you immediately release the grapple from both yourself and the target.
74399416-5b3a-415a-a302-a0dbb4c49c03: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can make an awesome blow {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}. On a successful maneuver against a corporeal foe smaller than you, the foe takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to that of the your primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}, is knocked flying 10 feet in the direction of the {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, and falls prone.
bb4049aa-f31c-4d05-af80-d755214610bb: At 10th level, a dragonblood shifter gains a breath weapon of her energy type that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per shifter level within a 30-foot cone. A target can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the dragonblood shifter's shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) to reduce the damage by half. The dragonblood shifter can use her breath weapon a number of times per day equal to half her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
3e63b590-a4d8-401f-acbc-5e96728cc014: At 10th level, the rageshaper can grow up to a maximum of two {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} categories larger with devastating form; his rage is now treated as greater rage, as the barbarian ability of the same name; and the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die of his ground slam ability increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}.
e5d6e10c-e171-4f2b-a726-60d79470e2f9: At 11th level, her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
40144ad9-a72b-45b0-a34e-f3e66a98ad8a: At 11th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
97f1949c-0237-4cf6-81fe-ba4b7cbea80e: At 11th level, his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} (1d6 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
fbab8ff3-d643-4f98-acbd-dee8c9a7154b: At 13th level, her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} (1d8 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
7f63e6b7-b7c1-42a6-bce8-2d2ae370c70c: At 13th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} (1d8 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
434948ca-8696-4393-a11f-c454d8a68d9a: At 13th level, his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} (1d8 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
c7f3c976-8bc4-46b9-8271-3f64fda548a4:
At 14th level, a dragonblood shifter's ties to her draconic abilities grow stronger. Her {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against sleep and paralysis effects increases to +4. Her wild shape ability now functions as the dragonkind II {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
You become a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}large{/g} dragon-like creature. You gain a +6 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +4 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +6 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}), two claws (1d6), two secondary wing {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} (1d6) (secondary attacks do not benefit from shifter claws), and one tail slap attack (1d8). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability lasts for 1 hour (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using dragon shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The dragonblood shifter can use dragon shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
This replaces greater chimeric aspect.
42614f6a-4971-461a-92e2-a6809ed55081:
At 14th level, a feyform shifter gains a third aspect. When she uses her shifter aspect ability to take on her fey aspect, she can choose two aspects and assume the minor form of each aspect, alongside her fey aspect.
This modifies greater chimeric aspect.
9e371559-061f-4b1c-af39-c43720962438:
At 14th level, a fiendflesh shifter's chimeric fiend ability grants her additional bonuses as noted below.
Daemon: A +4 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score and immunity to disease.
Demon: A +4 inherent bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score and increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die of all {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} by one category.
Devil: A +4 inherent bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score and immunity to blindness.
This replaces greater chimeric aspect.
cd89421c-3ebb-4d43-81d6-a3534183cd7a: At 14th level, when a shifter uses her shifter aspect ability to take on a minor form, she can choose up to three aspects and assume the minor form of each aspect.
7c01a042-6440-4c90-ba88-fa1e81a15607: At 15th level, you are no longer fatigued at the end of your rage.
12bcf862-75a0-4693-86ca-dfed5a7db079: At 17th level, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3.
5211a367-2f89-4678-97a5-59e79de38a4f: At 17th level, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3.
59b8760c-c828-4d38-9924-e20a9e46a688: At 17th level, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3.
828305c4-0de4-4763-85bf-8d4f207f42e5: At 19th level, the claws bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/adamantine and N/-.
82533b82-a8c6-4ced-ae9d-5151210bb423: At 19th level, the slams bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/adamantine and N/-.
6247f318-3e51-453e-bc34-434cd8bb22a9: At 19th level, the spikes bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/adamantine and N/-.
bd1d6ab3-642c-4220-8297-9aa5e658f325:
At 1st level, a fiendflesh shifter can temporarily transform her body into an amalgam of otherworldly evil creatures as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. While in this form, the fiendflesh shifter gains a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (1d4 points of damage if the fiendflesh shifter is Small) and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/good. She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
At 5th level, the fiendflesh shifter's DR increases to 2/good, and she also grows a pair of bat-like wings when in her fiendish aspect, granting her immunity to ground-based effects.
At 10th level, the fiendflesh shifter's DR increases to 5/good, and the electricity and fire {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} provided by her fiendish resilience ability doubles while she is in her fiendish aspect.
At 15th level, the fiendflesh shifter's DR increases to 7/good, and she gains a +4 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
At 20th level, the fiendflesh shifter's DR increases to 10/good. She also gains {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to electricity and fire and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 15 + her shifter level.
This replaces wild shape, shifter aspect, and all improvements to shifter aspect.
a33706ab-9710-49e0-b566-b450920969db:
At 1st level, a shifter gains her first aspect — a category of animal to which her body and soul have become supernaturally attuned. She can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. Until a shifter reaches 9th level and gains the chimeric aspect class feature, she can assume only one minor form at a time. Shifting to a new aspect (or aspects, in the case of chimeric aspects or greater chimeric aspects) ends all minor forms currently manifested.
As the shifter gains levels, she gains more aspects; she gains her second aspect at 5th level, a third aspect at 10th level, and a fourth at 15th level.
ed47de61-8fed-4202-8ac2-694ca0a370a1: At 20th level, a dragonblood shifter's tie to her draconic abilities reaches its peak. She becomes immune to sleep and paralysis effects. She can use wild shape to transform into a dragon at will.
f896c164-8cbd-4438-b206-5f6ea1801f73: At 20th level, a feyform shifter gains access to a fourth aspect. When she uses shifter aspect, she can assume the minor forms of all her aspects in addition to her fey aspect, and she can use her major and minor forms at will.
375a26fb-a31a-4988-90b8-c1ef069141e9: At 20th level, a fiendflesh shifter can assume the minor forms of all her aspects at will.
cc3d6e84-09eb-4367-a6d7-807d3f285c98: At 20th level, a griffonheart shifter can use her major and minor forms at will.
d7038062-a9c5-4e34-89ed-66192939fda0: At 20th level, a shifter gains access to a fifth aspect, and when she uses her shifter aspect ability, she can assume the minor forms of all her aspects; the shifter can also use her major and minor forms at will.
8628bf67-ee98-455f-94c4-ed3b7b246e01: At 20th level, the rageshaper gains a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} in devastating form; his rage is now treated as mighty rage, as the barbarian ability of the same name; and the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} die of his ground slam ability increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g}.
e7f4bb4d-8d47-48c1-9abe-bbc857f56d0f:
At 2nd level, a fiendflesh shifter gains a +1 natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 5 to electricity and fire, but only while unencumbered and either wearing no armor or wearing light or medium nonmetal armor. At 4th level, 12th level, and 20th level, this natural armor bonus increases by 1. At 8th level and 16th level, the fiendflesh shifter's resistance to electricity and fire increases by 10.
This replaces defensive instinct.
d85476a1-0980-491b-ae1c-b51bf6690d78:
At 2nd level, a rageshaper becomes difficult to harm in his devastating form. Whenever the rageshaper takes on his devastating form and is unencumbered and either wearing no armor or wearing light or medium nonmetal armor, he gains a +2 natural armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to his {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 2/-. At 10th level, the rageshaper's DR increases to 5/-. At 15th level, the rageshaper's DR increases to 7/-. At 20th level, the rageshaper's DR increases to 10/-, and his natural armor bonus to AC increases to +4.
This replaces defensive instinct, chimeric aspect, and greater chimeric aspect.
8109347c-0e5b-49e1-b891-ea18c3f14800: At 2nd level, a shifter adds half her {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature) checks{/g}.
703e5527-6752-4a8b-afa2-8183ca474a65:
At 2nd level, when unarmored, not using a shield, and conscious, the shifter adds her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} bonus (if any) to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}. In addition, the shifter gains a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her AC and CMD at 4th level. This bonus increases by 1 for every 4 shifter levels thereafter (up to a maximum of +5 at 20th level). If she is wearing nonmetal armor, she instead adds half her Wisdom bonus to her AC (minimum 0).
These bonuses to AC apply even against {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} and when the shifter is {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g}. She loses these bonuses when she is immobilized or {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. These bonuses do not stack with the monk AC bonus class feature.
696b529d-9d3b-4edf-82fe-e859e93c9ac4: At 3rd level, a shifter ignores movement {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} caused by difficult terrain, is immune to the entangled condition, and gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
294a91c4-6835-42a2-9a64-d7c5e95fa246: At 3rd level, her claws bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver.
325c29f6-09e3-42e7-bdda-7af5a5ac2118: At 3rd level, her spikes bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver.
0e3c4717-c141-4602-9de8-49b8462ed95b: At 3rd level, his slams bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver.
dd2c9ecf-2d18-4a51-908e-db95dae78b87:
At 4th level, a child of the manticore can use her wild shape ability to become a manticore. This ability lasts for 1 minute (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using manticore shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The child of the manticore can use manticore shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. While in this form, she gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), and four spike natural throwing {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}). At 9th level, the child of the manticore gains immunity to ground-based effects and a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on damage rolls with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}. At 14th level, the child of the manticore gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
Primary natural attacks: spike
This alters wild shape and replaces chimeric aspect and greater chimeric aspect.
3089c93d-7881-471d-aeea-a872296e0d72:
At 4th level, a feyform shifter can use her wild shape ability to become a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}large{/g} fey creature — an ankou. This ability lasts for 1 minute (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using fey shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The feyform shifter can use fey shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. While in this form, she gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +20 feet, two claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), two wing attacks (1d4 damage), and a tail attack (1d4 damage). While in this form, the feyform shifter can make sneak attacks, as the rogue ability of the same name, using her shifter level as her effective rogue level for the purpose of determining damage. At 8th level, the feyform shifter can select a rogue talent, using her shifter level as her effective rogue level for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites. At 10th level, the feyform shifter gains evasion, as the rogue class feature of the same name, and at 14th level, she can select another rogue talent.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: claw, wing, and tail
This alters wild shape.
ecc5cb00-bed7-4c44-b14d-ed3a5ef85878: At 4th level, a griffonheart shifter can use her wild shape ability to become a griffon. This ability lasts for 1 minute (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using griffon shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The griffonheart shifter can use griffon shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier. While in this form, she gains a base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} of 50 feet, two claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), a bite attack (1d8 damage), and immunity to ground-based effects. While in this form, the griffonheart shifter gains the grabber ability with her claw attacks. She also gains a combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, using her shifter level as her effective fighter level for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites. If he has levels in fighter, these levels stack. At 9th level, the griffonheart shifter gains the pounce ability and the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with her bite attack, and she can select another combat feat. At 14th level, the griffonheart shifter can select a third combat feat and gains the {g|Encyclopedia:Rake}rake{/g} ability.
67914aeb-6f34-412d-bd03-e12440e3e995:
At 4th level, a wild effigy's stone aspects no longer require even the semblance of flesh and blood to function. When a wild effigy is shifted into a minor or major aspect, or is transformed into one of her aspects using wild shape, she adds the ferocity ability to the list of that aspect's features and gains a 25% chance to ignore a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or precision {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. This does not stack with the fortification armor property or similar effects.
At 9th level, this chance increases to 50%, and she becomes immune to petrification.
At 15th level, this chance increases to 75%, and she becomes immune to bleed effects.
This replaces defensive instinct.
c75a9e6c-31eb-42f8-80e0-0d5e182b343d: At 6th level, a shifter gains the ability to make several ferocious {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with the same {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g}. Instead of attacking with all her natural weapons, the shifter can choose a single natural weapon and make a full attack with that natural weapon, gaining a second iterative attack at a -5 as if it was a manufactured weapon. When she does so, all her other natural attacks count as secondary attacks and do not benefit from shifter claws (the second attack with her shifter claws in her humanoid form counts as secondary but does not lose any shifter claws bonuses). The number of additional attacks increases with the shifter's {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} (she gains another iterative attack at a -10 when her BAB reaches +11 and so on).
161de72f-e047-4f5f-9b9a-3437bd11af2d: At 6th level, a wild effigy can sacrifice minutes from her aspects' minor forms to turn her claws into adamantine. By expending a 1-minute increment of her shifter's minor aspect ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, she can grant her shifter claws the ability to ignore an amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} or hardness equal to her shifter level for 1 minute.
b50253be-ce07-488b-bfa6-ed84fef337fb: At 7th level, her claw {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
895930c5-839c-407d-b618-ec69a7386538: At 7th level, her spike {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
377d2602-265f-4ecf-b254-0945ac99647e: At 7th level, his slam {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} (1d4 if {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}).
f01380f4-4ea1-42b0-ba92-a68599bb2d9a:
At 9th level, a dragonblood shifter can push her form closer to that of a true dragon. She gains a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against sleep and paralysis effects. She does not gain the wild shape ability until 9th level. When using the ability, she takes on the form of a true dragon; this ability functions as the dragonkind I {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} instead of beast shape II.
You become a {g|Encyclopedia:Size}medium{/g} dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +2 polymorph bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}), two claws (1d6), and two secondary wing {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} (1d4) (secondary attacks do not benefit from shifter claws). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability lasts for 1 minute (the Master Shapeshifter mythic ability makes this duration permanent). Using dragon shape is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not cause {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. The dragonblood shifter can use dragon shape a number of times per day equal to her shifter level + her {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} modifier.
This alters wild shape and replaces chimeric aspect.
81a80d7a-901e-41b6-888b-5d0d6504afe2:
At 9th level, a feyform shifter gains a second shifter aspect, chosen from the animal aspects normally available to shifters. When she uses her shifter aspect ability to take on her fey aspect, she can choose a second aspect and assume the minor form of that aspect, alongside her fey aspect, allowing her to combine her fey aspect with the animal aspects available to her.
This modifies chimeric aspect.
32989d03-2811-4bf7-ad4e-ca9415695185:
At 9th level, when a fiendflesh shifter uses her fiendish aspect ability, she can gain an additional ability from the list below. The fiendflesh shifter can change which ability she gains each time she uses fiendish aspect.
Daemon: Acid {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to the resistance provided by her fiendish resilience ability and a +4 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against disease.
Demon: Cold resistance equal to the resistance provided by her fiendish resilience ability and a +4 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}.
Devil: A +4 dodge bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +4 profane bonus on Reflex saving throws.
This replaces chimeric aspect.
53e97500-fdb5-42fa-b507-75e35a67fc1b: At 9th level, when a shifter uses her shifter aspect ability to take on a minor form, she can choose two aspects and assume the minor form of each aspect.
a342a3f6-e0e1-4aeb-85c3-da195f908511:
At will, a shifter in her natural form can extend her claws as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to use as a weapon. The claws on each hand can be used as a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} and slashing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (1d3 if she is {g|Encyclopedia:Size}Small{/g}). As the shifter gains levels, the power of her claws increases. At 3rd level, her claws bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/cold iron, N/magic, and N/silver. At 7th level, her claw damage increases to 1d6 (1d4 if Small). At 11th level, her claw damage increases to 1d8 (1d6 if Small). At 13th level, her claw damage increases to 1d10 (1d8 if Small). At 17th level, the damage die does not increase, but the {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier becomes ×3. Finally, at 19th level, the claws bypass DR N/adamantine and N/-.
While a shifter uses wild shape to assume her aspect's major form, her primary natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} gain the same benefits granted by her shifter claws ability. She can use either the base damage of her shifter claws or the damage of the form's primary attacks, whichever is greater. A list of primary attacks is provided in the description of each major form.
1273fc55-8d8f-4ee9-9398-f443cad54622:
At will, a shifter in her natural form can extend her claws as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} to use as a weapon. The claws on each hand can be used as a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g}.
As the shifter gains levels, the power of her claws increases.
c5f5e594-10ad-4258-aac8-a165928c4b6c: Breath Weapon — Ability is not ready yet
5b92f281-d4bd-4eb9-b465-9b4085fd342a: By way of the druidic discipline of wild shape, shifters become living aspects of the wild. At first, they are able to assume only a minor aspect, but with time and practice they can fully transform into ever more powerful forms.
f328a46b-b610-40e3-8fc1-31122d3072f3: Dragonblood shifters draw upon the inherent strength and majesty of the true dragons, gaining a measure of their powers from their association.
0de9e1b0-d9fa-4313-8b9e-a7d70f8669ef: Feyform shifters are intimately linked to the First World and can draw from it to gain otherworldly powers.
f0de7bbc-1651-463d-b299-f15f534f1874: Manticores are known to breed with many lion-like creatures, and shifters in lion forms are no exception. Perhaps you are the result of someone's vile experiment, or some other circumstances have dictated that your shifting abilities have become twisted by manticore blood.
7afaece6-b4c0-4514-a9b4-2583abd8b670: Not all shifters represent the balance of nature. The rageshaper is a destructive force of nature brought to bear — a wild and uncontrollable engine of annihilation fueled by wrath. Rageshapers fly into bloodletting frenzies and rain down devastation like unstoppable natural disasters.
b253d80d-29a1-44ec-82a3-2c5abd55535d: Once per use of devastating form, a rageshaper can slam the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per shifter level + an additional 1d10 bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every enemy hit by this ability to all enemies within 20 feet of him and knocking them prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the rageshaper's shifter level + the rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.
4489eb41-2728-48a6-8a6b-b13218224f17: Once per use of devastating form, a rageshaper can slam the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per shifter level + an additional 1d6 bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every enemy hit by this ability to all enemies within 20 feet of him and knocking them prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the rageshaper's shifter level + the rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.
1079a20a-3f15-4b80-9a31-46ccc85167c9: Once per use of devastating form, a rageshaper can slam the ground, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per shifter level + an additional 1d8 bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for every enemy hit by this ability to all enemies within 20 feet of him and knocking them prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the rageshaper's shifter level + the rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.
db02b419-0c08-499b-8ef6-ce858a9dcb55:
The aspect of the bear invokes a juggernaut of tireless endurance and furious power. Those who take this aspect are known for surviving severe wounds and delivering punishing blows in return.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large dire bear. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d6 damage) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your claw attacks. At 15th level, your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} multiplier with your claw attacks increases by 1 (×2 becomes ×3, for example) up to a maximum of ×4, and you gain the Awesome Blow {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw
274bc870-995c-4653-beaf-0f6691db4d5c:
The aspect of the bear invokes a juggernaut of tireless endurance and furious power. Those who take this aspect are known for surviving severe wounds and delivering punishing blows in return. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
ea7c37e9-99c6-44c8-bee1-1f2ad5f6f7ed:
The aspect of the horse grants speed and maneuverability.
Minor Form: You gain the Endurance {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as well as an inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +5 feet to your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +10 feet. At 15th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +15 feet.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large horse. While in this form, you gain a speed bonus of +20 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), two hoof {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and your attacks deal double damage if used when charging or attempting an overrun {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g}. At 8th level, you can move through {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened squares{/g} without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and you gain the overrun ability. At 15th level, you gain Improved Overrun as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites for this feat.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: hoof
8323bd64-b2a4-4b0c-8709-570de2bf4b36:
The aspect of the horse grants speed and maneuverability. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. Shifting into a minor form is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, while ending the effect is a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}.
Minor Form: You gain the Endurance {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} as well as an inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +5 feet to your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +10 feet. At 15th level, the bonus to your base speed increases to +15 feet.
3b879e4c-3651-4905-9034-906699383834:
The aspect of the lizard is one of swift, graceful movement, granting the ability to dart and scurry with an astounding agility and balance.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large lizard. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), and a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}) with the grabber ability. At 8th level, your speed bonus increases to +30 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
b60636ca-a654-4082-86ad-1c3bd1e2c347:
The aspect of the lizard is one of swift, graceful movement, granting the ability to dart and scurry with an astounding agility and balance. The shifter can shift into her aspect's minor form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. At 15th level, you gain Bull Rush as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and your racial bonus to Strength ability score and natural armor bonus to AC increase to +4.

3efc403f-8689-48a6-926b-26dff48c6322: The shifter class offers players a way to experience a shapeshifting character that is more martially inclined than a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasting{/g} druid. 5a81c94d-913e-476d-b6ae-f032de6459a8:
The spider is a patient hunter, sensing foes that struggle in its webs.
Minor Form: You gain a +2 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4, and at 15th level, it increases to +6.

Web: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can attempt to wrap a foe in sticky webs as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If you hit the foe, they are immobilized and entangled. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the victim can attempt to break free by making a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} (the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with the greater bonus is selected automatically). Both skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} have a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + half your shifter level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier.
At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 20 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 30 feet.

7920352f-cfc6-458d-ac01-85d3a831a195:
This ability unlocks the aspect of the proud and fearless griffon — a creature dedicated to protecting its territory. These regal beasts are revered as symbols of freedom and strength in many cultures. A griffonheart shifter can take on the aspect of the griffon and assume griffon traits as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. While in this form, she gains an aura that grants her and her allies within 30 feet a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects; she also gains a +2 inherent bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} score. She can maintain this form for a number of minutes per day equal to 3 + her shifter level. The duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
At 5th level, the griffonheart shifter grows a pair of bird-like wings that grant her immunity to ground-based effects.
At 10th level, the griffonheart shifter's bonus to Strength increases to +4, and her aura now grants her and her allies immunity to fear.
At 15th level, the griffonheart shifter's bonus to Strength increases to +6, and she gains a +4 inherent bonus on her Will saving throws.
At 20th level, the griffonheart shifter's bonus to Strength increases to +8, her inherent bonus on Will saving throws increases to +6, and she becomes resistant to movement-impairing effects (as per the freedom of movement {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}).
This alters and replaces all improvements to shifter aspect.
b983e12f-93f8-4149-8d3a-46b2b2cd009a:
This aspect unlocks the brutal ferocity and tenacious fury of the wolverine. The wolverine's lust for battle invigorates its will to live, and it can press on in battle longer than its enemies expect.
Minor Form: You gain 2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per shifter level you have and a +2 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score. At 8th level, you gain Diehard as a bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and the additional hit points increase to 4 per shifter level you have. At 15th level, the racial bonus to your Constitution score increases to +4, and the additional hit points increase to 6 per shifter level you have.
Major Form: Your shape changes to that of a large dire wolverine. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d8 damage). Additionally, whenever you are dealt damage in combat, you enter a state identical to a barbarian's rage. You can remain in this state for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + twice your shifter level + your Constitution modifier. This ability otherwise functions like a barbarian's rage and benefits from rage powers gained from other sources. At 8th level, you can choose two barbarian rage powers, using your shifter level as your effective barbarian level for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites. At 15th level, you are no longer fatigued at the end of your rage.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw

561bca2d-7894-4155-93ca-54099cb335b1:
Whenever this creature hits an enemy with a melee attack, it also attempts a grapple maneuver check against its target. If the check is successful, both the target and the creature are grappled.
Grappled characters cannot move, take a -2 penalty on all attack rolls and a -4 penalty to Dexterity-based checks, cannot make attacks of opportunity, and whenever they cast a spell or use a spell-like ability, they must make a concentration check against a DC of 10 + the spell's level + the grappler's CMB or lose the spell.
The target of the grapple attempts to escape every round by making a successful Athletics or Mobility skill check, or Strength check. The DC of this check is the grappler's CMD.
While grappling the target, the grappler cannot take standard actions. Each round, the grappler makes a grapple maneuver check with a +5 circumstance bonus. On success, the target is pinned and takes damage equal to that of the grappler's attack with the highest damage dice. As a free action, the grappler can end the grapple for both themselves and the target. If the check fails, this ends the grapple for both the grappler and the target.
Pinned characters suffer the following penalties:
Character suffers all of the penalties from being grappled
Character loses their Dexterity and dodge bonuses to AC
Character cannot take standard actions
Character suffers a -4 penalty to AC
This ability also gives the creature a +4 bonus on grapple maneuver checks.
be1103b7-8f14-4b07-b058-1a8608a6fa4f: Whether riding on the wind as a falcon or hiding in some fetid bog waiting to strike, the shifter is a true master of the wild. Both a devoted defender of druidic circles and a fierce predator, the shifter can take on the forms of nature and even fuse them together with devastating effect and unbridled savagery. Shifters are protectors of druidic circles and avengers of nature, yet a shifter's magic is different from that of her druidic kin. Rather than invoking {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} from the natural world or forging alliances with animals, shifters focus their supernatural powers inward to gain control over their own forms. Their ability to change their forms is as varied as the wonders of the wilds themselves but always remains at least partially rooted in the natural world. There are many paths to becoming a shifter; most are trained in that role by druidic circles and have their powers unlocked via rituals of initiation. Yet some stumble upon the gift naturally, as if their blood bore the secrets of shifter transformation.
1ceb6c1e-7189-406e-8c1d-0fc4b6f216d5:
While in rage, a rageshaper gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} rolls, melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. He also gains 2 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Die{/g}.

A successful Reflex save ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 10 + half the rageshaper's shifter level + the rageshaper's {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier) halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.

Your shape changes to that of a large dire bear. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d6 damage) with the grabber ability. Your shape changes to that of a large dire wolverine. While in this form, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} bonus of +10 feet, the {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g} ability (30 feet), a bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}), and two claw attacks (1d8 damage). Additionally, whenever you are dealt damage in combat, you enter a state identical to a barbarian's rage. You can remain in this state for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to 4 + twice your shifter level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier. This ability otherwise functions like a barbarian's rage and benefits from rage powers gained from other sources. At 8th level, you can choose two barbarian rage powers, using your shifter level as your effective barbarian level for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites. At 15th level, you are no longer fatigued at the end of your rage.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite, claw

Your shape changes to that of a medium spider. While in this form, you gain the tremorsense ability (10 feet), the web special {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, and a bite attack ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}).
Web: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can attempt to wrap a foe in sticky webs as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If you hit the foe, they are immobilized and entangled. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the victim can attempt to break free by making a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g} (the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with the greater bonus is selected automatically). Both skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} have a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + half your shifter level + your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier.
At 8th level, you gain a +4 racial {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception checks{/g}, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 20 feet. At 15th level, you gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Improved_NaturalAttack}improved natural attack{/g} ability with your bite attack, and the range of your tremorsense ability increases to 30 feet.
Primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}: bite
